name: Terminator
description: Used to clearly define the start or stop point in a process or a flow in your diagram

name: Process
description: An operation or action step - Indicates any processing function. Illustrate actions taken, calculations performed, or tasks completed

name: Decision
description: A question or a decision in the process between two or more paths in a flowchart. Usually a yes/no or true/false branching duo to different outcomes

name: Preparation
description: A preparation process step, like setting a switch or setting-up a routine

name: Input/Output
description: Indicates data inputs and outputs to and from a process, be it a user input, system output, or data exchange with external sources

name: Manual Input
description: A process step that isn't automated, requiring a manual intervention or human action. Used to show a user tasks, operator involvement, or steps requiring external human input

name: Display
description: Indicates displayed data for a screen of exported to a text file

name: Delay
description: A waiting period - Indicates a delay in the process

name: Merge
description: Indicates a step that merge multiple processes into one

name: Extract
description: Used to extract or to split a processes. Also used to indicates a measurement or finished goods

name: Document
description: Represents the input or output of a printed document or report

name: Multiple Documents
description: Represents multiple inputs or outputs of a printed documents or reports

name: On Page Connector
description: A jump from one point to another, and replace a long line on a flowchart page. Represented by a small circle with a letter inside

name: Off Page Connector
description: Indicates a jump from one page of the diagram to another page. Represented by a square with one pointed edge with a letter inside

name: Database
shape: Cylinder with an Oval on Top
description: Indicates a database that allows for searching and sorting

name: Internal Storage
description: Indicates an internal storage that allows for searching and sorting

name: Predefined Process
description: A process defined elsewhere in the flowchart or from another source

name: Or
shape: Circle with a Plus Sign Inside
description: Logical OR operator

name: And
shape: Circle with a Cross Sign Inside
description: Logical AND operator

name: Sort
description: Step that organizes data into lists using a schema

name: Collate
shape: Two Triangles on Top of Each Other
description: Step that organizes data into a schema
